content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapsefiledev_synapsetrialdev_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapsefiledev_synapsetrialdev_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsefiledev@synapsetrialdev.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [open_data_population] (
	[datasetid] nvarchar(4000),
	[recordid] nvarchar(4000),
	[total_population] bigint,
	[female_population] bigint,
	[count] bigint,
	[foreign_born] bigint,
	[state_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[average_household_size] float,
	[city] nvarchar(4000),
	[race] nvarchar(4000),
	[male_population] bigint,
	[median_age] float,
	[number_of_veterans] bigint,
	[state] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'opendata-population/open_population_2022-02-18.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapsefiledev_synapsetrialdev_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [Staging].[open_data_population]
GO
